mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Post (name,isAdmin, contents, createTime, views, categoryId, userId, fileId,updateTime) VALUES (#{name},#{isAdmin,} #{contents}, #{createTime}, #{views}, #{categoryId}, #{userId}, #{fileId},#{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, isAdmin, contents, createTime, views, categoryId, userId, fileId, updateTime FROM Post WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Post SET name = #{name}, contents = #{contents}, views = #{views}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, userId = #{userId}, fileId = #{fileId}, updateTime = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
